title: [Feature Request] Inverse Hyperbolic Functions
body_html:
Hi,

As far as I can tell, PyTorch doesn't have inverses implemented for hyperbolic functions. These are useful, e.g., for operations on hyperbolic space. (A notable example being that the distance function on the hyperboloid model of hyperbolic space uses the inverse hyperbolic cosine.) It's not that hard to implement these functions by hand, but inconvenient.

Thanks,
Shawn

(A notable example being that the distance function on the hyperboloid model of hyperbolic space uses the inverse hyperbolic cosine.)
